Module com.coursework.cw1dms
Package com.coursework.cw1dms.Game

Class GameScene

java.lang.Object
com.coursework.cw1dms.Game.GameScene
public class GameScene extends Object
GameScene.java involves all the game logic regarding the 2048 game
Author:
Chun Hong Boey

    Method checks whether you have empty cells, logic-> if method returns -1, you have no more remaining moves left, and you lose the game, when method returns 1, it means that you still have empty cells avaliable, and 0 means you have gotten 2048, and would abruptly stop the game, as you have reached the objective

      public static int n
      variable that controls the dimension of grid

  • Constructor Details

    • GameScene

      public GameScene()

  • Method Details

    • setN

      public static void setN(int number)
      This method is a setter for the variable n and sets the variable LENGTH according to the specific n number , the height and the distance between cells
      Parameters:
      number - used to overwrite variable n;

    • getN

      public int getN()
      This method is a getter method for the variable n
      Returns:
      n which represent the dimension of the grid

    • randomFillNumber

      public void randomFillNumber()
      Method used to randomly fill number "2" or "4" at a random space in the cells

    • haveEmptyCell

      public int haveEmptyCell()
      Method checks whether you have empty cells, logic-> if method returns -1, you have no more remaining moves left, and you lose the game, when method returns 1, it means that you still have empty cells avaliable, and 0 means you have gotten 2048, and would abruptly stop the game, as you have reached the objective
      Returns:
      -1, no more remaining moves(no more empty cells). 1, there's empty cells, 0, you have gotten 2048

    • passDestination

      public int passDestination(int i, int j, char direct)
      Method logically returns the new location of where the cell should go if user where to press up,down,left right, based on the availability of space
      Parameters:
      i - represents the row index of the cell
      j - represents the column index of the cell
      direct - represents the current move
      Returns:
      the new location on where the cell should go

    • moveLeft

      public int moveLeft()
      Method detects when user moves left, if the user moves left then method would return y=1
      Returns:
      y=1 when user presses left

    • moveRight

      public int moveRight()
      Method detects when user moves right, if the user moves right then method would return y=1
      Returns:
      y=1 when user presses right

    • moveUp

      public int moveUp()
      Method detects when user moves up, if the user moves up then method would return y=1
      Returns:
      y=1 when user presses up

    • moveDown

      public int moveDown()
      Method detects when user moves down, if the user moves down then method would return y=1
      Returns:
      y=1 when user presses down

    • isValidDesH

      public boolean isValidDesH(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      Method used to determine whether the destination of a cell is another cell with the same number
      Parameters:
      i - row index of cell that is being checked
      j - column index of cell that is being checked
      des - destination of cell after moving
      sign - indication of which movement, up and left is -1, down and right is 1
      Returns:
      true if destination cell = current cell, return false otherwise

    • moveHorizontally

      public int moveHorizontally(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      Method ensures that: cells are moved correctly according to user input, and method detects movement, if there's movement(ref to line 309) and the cell does not equal to 0, then return 1
      Parameters:
      i - row index
      j - column index
      des - destination of celling after moving
      sign - indication of which movement, up and left is -1, down and right is 1
      Returns:
      1 if moved, 0 otherwise

    • isValidDesV

      public boolean isValidDesV(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      Method used to determine whether the destination of a cell is another cell with the same number
      Parameters:
      i - row index of cell that is being checked
      j - column index of cell that is being checked
      des - destination of cell after moving
      sign - indication of which movement, up and left is -1, down and right is 1
      Returns:
      true if destination cell = current cell, return false otherwise

    • moveVertically

      public int moveVertically(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      Method ensures that: cells are moved correctly according to user input, and method detects movement, if there's movement(ref to line 353) and the cell does not equal to 0, then return 1
      Parameters:
      i - row index
      j - column index
      des - destination of celling after moving
      sign - indication of which movement, up and left is -1, down and right is 1
      Returns:
      1 if moved, 0 otherwise

    • haveSameNumberNearly

      public boolean haveSameNumberNearly(int i, int j)
      Method checks whether the adjacent cells are the same
      Parameters:
      i - row index
      j - column index
      Returns:
      true if the adjacent cells are the same, false if not

    • canNotMove

      public boolean canNotMove()
      Method checks if there are any possible moves anymore on the board
      Returns:
      true if there's adjacent cells are the same, false if not

    • sumCellNumbersToScore

      public void sumCellNumbersToScore()
      Method accumulates score according to cells that were added, eg:- Score is 8 when two "4" cells are added

    • TextScore

      public void TextScore(javafx.scene.text.Text text, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Method are properties of the word, and also adds the word in GameScene
      Parameters:
      text - new text "SCORE"

    • ShowScore

      public void ShowScore(javafx.scene.text.Text scoreText, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Method are properties of the word, and also adds the word in GameScene
      Parameters:
      scoreText - new text "0"

    • spin

      public void spin()
      Method that spins the whole entire GameScene --> Easter egg!

    • game

      public void game(javafx.scene.Scene gameScene, javafx.scene.Group root, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Method contains initial settings for the start of the game, and logic such as: you can only move if you were to press Up, Down, Left, Right and when would spawning occur (ref to line 460 onwards)
      Parameters:
      gameScene - get Instance of GameScene class
      root - node that contains all the components in GameScene class
      primaryStage - stage used to switch scenes around the game
      color - color from colorPicker in main menu
